text: meyama ibrahim tamange paramparave ayatada niyama kaleya. tavada yakubda (me akarayatama niyama kala atara tamange paramparave ayata) “mage paramparave daruvani! oba venuven allah mema dharmaya (islamaya)ma toragena ætteya. ebævin oba satya muslimvarun vasayen misa, maranayata pat novanu!” (yayi pævasuveya)
